TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed FormsAuthenticationUserCollection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationElementCollection
Public NotInheritable Class FormsAuthenticationUserCollection Inherits ConfigurationElementCollection

span.span: Represents a collection of objects.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用以编程方式访问和修改`users`元素`credentials`主题中`forms`部分`authorization`配置节。The uses the to programmatically access and modify the `users` element of the `credentials` section in the `forms` section of the `authorization` configuration section. 此类型是包括的组的一部分、 ，和类型。This type is part of a group that includes the , the , and the types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. > [!NOTE] > 如果你使用`credentials`元素一定要遵循的指南，详见[ASP.NET 身份验证](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1)。If you use the `credentials` element be sure to follow the guidelines explained at [ASP.NET Authentication](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fc10b0ef-4ce4-4a7f-9174-886325221ee1). 有关可伸缩性和更高的安全性，建议你使用的外部数据库来存储用户的凭据。For scalability and better security, it is recommended you use an external database to store the users' credentials. 有关生成安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序的详细信息，搜索 Microsoft MSDN 网站 (msdn.microsoft.com) 为"保护 ASP.NET 应用程序"和"构建安全的 ASP.NET 应用程序： 身份验证、 授权和安全通信。"For more information about building secure ASP.NET applications, search the Microsoft MSDN Web site (msdn.microsoft.com) for "Securing Your ASP.NET Application" and "Building Secure ASP.NET Applications: Authentication, Authorization, and Secure Communication." remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将插入`clear`指令插入要清除对在更高级的配置文件中定义的元素的所有引用的配置文件的相应节。This method inserts a `clear` directive into the appropriate section of the configuration file to clear all references to elements defined in a higher-level configuration file. 删除当前的配置文件的相应节中定义的所有元素。All elements defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file are removed. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将插入`remove`元素插入在更高级的配置文件中定义的所有元素的配置文件的相应节。This method inserts a `remove` element into the appropriate section of the configuration file for any element defined in a higher-level configuration file. 如果该元素定义在当前的配置文件的相应部分中，从配置文件中移除其项。If the element is defined in the appropriate section of the current configuration file, its entry is removed from the configuration file. 要移除的对象必须存在于集合中。The object to remove must exist in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例说明如何使用 方法。The following code example shows how to use the method.
